short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur ChatGPT history pane items by default for privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your ChatGPT conversations private with Peekaboo 🔒, a simple and sleek privacy micro-extension that blurs your chat history. Keep your chats hidden when you’re in public or sharing your screen - just hover to quickly reveal them when you need to. 👀

Features:
🔒 Built for Privacy: Automatically blur your ChatGPT history so your conversations stay private.
👀 Quick Peek: Hover over your history to unblur it whenever you need.
🎛️ Easy Control: Turn the blur effect on or off with a single click in settings.
✨ Clean and Simple: Designed to blend right in with ChatGPT’s look, no clutter.

Whether you’re working in public, sharing your screen, or just like a little extra privacy, Peekaboo makes it easy to keep your ChatGPT conversations personal without any hassle. 🧑‍💻💬
